translation.Message_0_Page_0: My name is <name_npc>. I'm a sniper.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Before the breakout, I was a special forces paratrooper in the British Army.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: After a few years I quit and moved to France.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Then people started turning all over the world, so I enlisted in the French Army to do what I do best.
